name: That's Deep!
description:
Dadaistic Haiku Runner made for the Ludum Dare 48. 
Theme: Deeper and Deeper
Space to jump. R to restart.

Play as a dark swallow jumping over words. Pick the ones you want, jump over the ones you don't.
There's no scores or winners, just deep Dadá.

I want to see your poems!

Made in a day with microStudio.
https://microstudio.dev/

SFX and font:
https://freesound.org/s/523425/
https://freesound.org/s/367217
https://www.1001fonts.com/lady-ice-font.html
